vision: A groundbreaking research paper that demonstrates automation of the scrum process in project planning from product vision to sprint review using large language models
niche: Entrepreneurial and innovative company looking to boost productivity 100x

current_state.awareness: unaware of how good language models are at automating product development
current_state.scrum execution: unable to execute the scrum process effectively

desired_state.awareness: understands fully how language models can automate scrum process
desired_state.scrum execution: able to execute the scrum process swiftly and effectively

requirements.name: Language model integration
requirements.description: Integrate state-of-the-art language models to automate the scrum process
requirements.assumptions: Assuming that the company is willing to invest in technology to boost productivity
requirements.risks: Possible risks include the need for technical expertise to integrate the language models

requirements.name: Scrum process training
requirements.description: Provide training on the scrum process to ensure effective execution
requirements.assumptions: Assuming that the company has limited knowledge of the scrum process
requirements.risks: Possible risks include the need for time and resources to conduct the training

requirements.name: Scrum tool integration
requirements.description: Integrate a scrum tool to streamline the scrum process
requirements.assumptions: Assuming that the company is currently using manual methods to execute the scrum process
requirements.risks: Possible risks include the need for technical expertise to integrate the scrum tool

features.name: Automated Sprint Planning
features.explanation: Leverage large language models to automate sprint planning by generating user stories and tasks based on product vision and backlog items.
features.reasoning: Automating sprint planning will save time and reduce errors in the planning process, allowing teams to focus on more important tasks.
features.goal: Integrate state-of-the-art language models to automate the scrum process

features.name: Automated Sprint Review
features.explanation: Use large language models to automatically generate sprint review reports based on sprint data and feedback from stakeholders.
features.reasoning: Automating the sprint review process will save time and reduce errors in the reporting process, allowing teams to focus on more important tasks.
features.goal: Integrate state-of-the-art language models to automate the scrum process

features.name: Scrum Process Training
features.explanation: Provide training on the scrum process to ensure effective execution and understanding of the process by all team members.
features.reasoning: Training on the scrum process will ensure that all team members are on the same page and understand their roles and responsibilities in the process.
features.goal: Provide training on the scrum process to ensure effective execution

stories.name: As a project manager, I want to be able to input project requirements and receive automated sprint planning recommendations so that I can save time and ensure efficient project planning
stories.reasoning: This story addresses the need for automated sprint planning, which is a key feature of the product

subtasks: Research existing sprint planning algorithms
Identify key factors to consider in algorithm design
Determine weighting of factors in algorithm
Create user interface for inputting project requirements
Integrate sprint planning algorithm into tool
Test tool with sample project requirements
Develop mechanism for project manager to provide feedback on recommended sprint plan
Incorporate feedback into algorithm for future recommendations
Research project management software to integrate with
Develop integration with selected software
Test integration with sample project

acceptance: The sprint planning tool should be able to take in project requirements as input
The sprint planning algorithm should be able to recommend a sprint plan based on the input project requirements
The feedback mechanism should allow the project manager to provide feedback on the recommended sprint plan and the algorithm should incorporate this feedback into future recommendations

stories.name: As a team member, I want to be able to easily review and provide feedback on sprint progress using automated reports so that I can stay informed and provide valuable input
stories.reasoning: This story addresses the need for automated sprint review, which is a key feature of the product

tasks.task: Design the automated sprint review report
subtasks: Identify the key metrics to be included in the report
Decide on the layout and format of the report
Create a mockup of the report for review

tasks.task: Develop the automated sprint review report
subtasks: Write code to extract data from the sprint
Calculate the metrics to be included in the report
Generate the report using the design created earlier
Test the report to ensure accuracy and completeness

tasks.task: Integrate the report into the product
subtasks: Identify the appropriate location for the report within the product
Ensure that the report is accessible to all team members
Test the integration to ensure that the report is displayed correctly
Add a feedback mechanism to the report
Ensure that team members can easily provide feedback on the report
Test the feedback mechanism to ensure that it is working correctly

acceptance: The automated sprint review report should include metrics such as sprint progress, team velocity, and burndown chart
The report should be designed in a clear and easy-to-read format, with visual aids to help team members quickly understand the data
The feedback mechanism should allow team members to provide comments and suggestions on the report, and should be easily accessible from within the report

stories.name: As a new team member, I want to receive comprehensive training on the scrum process so that I can effectively contribute to the project and understand the process
stories.reasoning: This story addresses the need for providing training on the scrum process, which is a key goal of the project

tasks.task: Identify the key components of the scrum process
subtasks: Research the scrum process and its key components
Identify the roles and responsibilities of the scrum team members
Create a presentation on the scrum process
Develop handouts and other materials to supplement the presentation
Identify the target audience for the training
Schedule training sessions at a convenient time and location
Conduct the training sessions

tasks.task: Evaluate the effectiveness of the training
subtasks: Collect feedback from the trainees
Analyze the feedback to identify areas for improvement
Make changes to the training materials and sessions as needed

acceptance: The training materials should cover all key components of the scrum process
The training materials should be easy to understand and follow
The training sessions should be scheduled at a time and location that is convenient for the target audience
